Package deusto.safebox.common.net

Class SocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • deusto.safebox.common.net.SocketHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, ClientHandler
    public abstract class SocketHandler
extends Thread
implements AutoCloseable
    Represents an endpoint of the socket connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketHandler

        private SocketHandler​(Runnable connectionEstablished,
                      Consumer<Packet> packetReceived)
        Creates a socket handler with the specified behavior.
        Parameters:
        connectionEstablished - called when the connection is ready to send and receive data.
        packetReceived - accepted when a packet is received from the other endpoint of the socket.

      • SocketHandler

        protected SocketHandler()
        Creates a socket handler with the default behavior.

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket​(Packet packet)
        Send a packet to the other endpoint of the socket. This method shouldn't be used without receiving the connectionEstablished callback.
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet to send.
